entry.title: PANTALÓN Chain Necklace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: Collane
Price: 23.90

Pantalón Chain Necklace

La collana rappresenta il prodotto chiave della linea Pantalón Essentials.
Un accessorio unico e versatile adatto ad ogni occasione per completare e arricchire il tuo outfit.

DETTAGLI DEL PRODOTTO

▪ Acciaio inossidabile
▪ Placcata in oro o argento
▪ Non contiene cadmio, piombo o nichel
▪ Logo Pantalón inciso sulla targhetta
▪ Chiusura con gancio regolabile
▪ Lunghezza 42cm / 45cm

entry.title: Black Prank Fisherman Beanie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: Beanie
Price: 25.00

PRODUCT DETAILS

Rib knit black fisherman beanie with mini-logo label at front and "IT'S A ℙRANK" embroidered at back. Over the ears fit. Unisex.

▪ 100% Acrylic

WASHING CARE

▪ Hand wash 
▪ Do not bleach
▪ Do not tumble dry
▪ Do not iron
▪ Do not dry clean

entry.title: Dispersal White Shorts
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: Shorts
Price: 69.00

Pantalón Brand Dispersal White Shorts

I nuovi PANTALÓNcini reinterpretano l’emblematico motivo del brand sul fronte e sul retro. Il modello realizzato in cotone di alta qualità, presenta un originale ricamo con logo Pantalón Brand e due tasche laterali. Caratterizzati da uno stile casual e dalla vita media, sono ideali da abbinare alle nostre t-shirt.

DETTAGLI DEL PRODOTTO:

▪ Fantasia a dispersione nera
▪ Tasche laterali
▪ Lunghezza al ginocchio
▪ Logo Pantalón ricamato 
▪ Colore bianco
▪ Unisex

Materiale: 100% Cotone French Terry di alta qualità 360 g/m²
Vestibilità: Oversize

Il modello indossa la taglia M ed è alto 172cm.

CURA DEL PRODOTTO

▪ Lavare al rovescio
▪ Lavare a max 30° C
▪ Non candeggiare
▪ Non asciugare in asciugatrice
▪ Non stirare sulla stampa
▪ Non lavare a secco

entry.title: Dispersal White Crewneck
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: Crewneck
Price: 69.00

Pantalón Brand Dispersal White Crewneck

The crewneck is characterized by the iconic brand motif on the front and back. The model, oversize fit and made of high quality cotton, has an original embroidery with logo Pantalón Brand on the chest. The garment, embellished with the brand’s inspiration label, features ribbed details on the neck, cuffs and waist.

PRODUCT DETAILS:

▪ Black dispersal design
▪ Pantalón logo embroidered at chest 
▪ Brand's symbol embroidered at back 
▪ Ribbed details
▪ Color white
▪ Unisex

Material: 100% High quality french terry cotton 360 g/m²
Fit: Oversize

Model Andrea wears size M and his high is 186cm.

WASHING CARE

▪ Wash inside out
▪ Maximum wash 30° C
▪ Do not bleach
▪ Do not tumble dry
▪ Do not iron on the print
▪ Do not dry clean

entry.title: Dispersal Beige Hoodie
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: Hoodie
Price: 89.00

Pantalón Brand Dispersal Beige Hoodie

The hoodie is embellished by the dispersion design on the hood, key of the season and iconic brand motif. The garment is made of high quality pure fleece cotton, with oversized fit and shoulders down and is completed by a large central pocket on the front, ribbed details and multi-purpose carabiner on the side.

PRODUCT DETAILS:

▪ Turquoise dispersal design
▪ Pantalón logo embroidered at chest 
▪ Brand's symbol embroidered at back 
▪ Ribbed details
▪ Multi-purpose carabiner included (keychain excluded)
▪ Color beige
▪ Unisex

Material: 100% High quality fleece cotton 360 g/m²
Fit: Oversize

Model Andrea wears size M and his high is 186cm.

WASHING CARE

▪ Wash inside out
▪ Maximum wash 30° C
▪ Do not bleach
▪ Do not tumble dry
▪ Do not iron on the print
▪ Do not dry clean

entry.title: Dispersal White Iphone Case
entry.summary:
Vendor: Pantalón Brand
Type: Cover
Price: 25.00

Pantalón Brand Dispersal White Iphone Case

Pantalón Brand Iphone Case is a perfect mix of protection and style. It is easy to carry, thanks to its slim lines and compact design.

PRODUCT DETAILS

The perfect adherence of this cover ensures good protection to your device from bumps or accidental falls. TPU material also protects the battery of your phone from thermal shock or excessive overheating, it is a versatile material that does not attract dirt or lint. 

▪ White and grey dispersal design
▪ Pantalón logo printed in white
▪ Black
▪ 100% TPU
▪ Compatible with Iphone 12 PRO MAX - 12 PRO - 12 - 12 MINI - 11 PRO MAX - 11 PRO - 11 - XS MAX - X/XS - XR - 7/8 PLUS

Price: 35.00

Pantalón Brand Dispersal White AirPods Case

The Dispersal design lends to the Pantalón Brand AirPods case an iconic look. It features a modern keychain that can be attached to a bag handle or belt, ensuring it is convenient for traveling.

▪ 100% TPU
▪ Compatible AirPods 1 and AirPods 2 
▪ White dispersal design
